description: This is a market on who will win in the First Round, Game 5, NBA Playoff matchup between the Los Angeles Clippers and the Dallas Mavericks, scheduled to take place at 10:00 PM ET June 2, 2021. This market will resolve to “Clippers” if the Los Angeles Clippers win, and “Mavericks” if the Dallas Mavericks win. If the match is postponed to a date on or before June 9, 2021, 10:00 PM ET, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after June 9, 2021, 10:00 PM ET or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
